name: ixo-module
description: This is a node module that defines the functions that can be performed by the ixo protocol.

scripts.test-publish: npm pack && mv ixo-module-* test/ && mkdir ../test && cp -R test/ ../test && cd ../test && npm install ixo-module-* && node test.js && cd .. && rm -Rf test/

author: nicolaas.vercuiel73@gmail.com
